mapper.select: select count(1) from control_player_config where uid = #{uid}

select c.uid, r.name, c.type, c.risk_power riskPower, c.send_level sendLevel, c.mark, c.create_by createBy, c.create_time createTime from control_player_config c left join data_register r on c.uid = r.uid where and r.channel in (select t_id from sys_tenant where tenant = #{tid} and t_type = '2') and c.uid = #{uid} and c.type = #{type} and c.create_time >= #{beginTime} and #{endTime} >= c.create_time order by create_time desc

select i.id,i.uid, i.update_type updateType, i.update_before updateBefore, i.update_after updateAfter, i.update_time updateTime, i.update_by updateBy from control_player_info i left join data_register r on i.uid = r.uid where and r.channel in (select t_id from sys_tenant where tenant = #{tid}) and i.uid = #{uid} and i.update_by = #{updateBy} and i.update_type = #{updateType} and i.update_time >= #{beginTime} and #{endTime} >= i.update_time order by update_time desc
select uid, type, risk_power riskPower, send_level sendLevel, mark, create_by createBy, create_time createTime from control_player_config where uid = #{uid}
